member.name: F:s2industries.ZUGFeRD.ContentCodes.EEV
member.summary: Die Ware bleibt bis zur vollständigen Bezahlung unser Eigentum.

member.name: F:s2industries.ZUGFeRD.ContentCodes.WEV
member.summary: Die Ware bleibt bis zur vollständigen Bezahlung aller Forderungen unser Eigentum.

member.name: F:s2industries.ZUGFeRD.ContentCodes.VEV
member.summary: Die Ware bleibt bis zur vollständigen Bezahlung unser Eigentum. Dies gilt auch im Falle der Weiterveräußerung oder -verarbeitung der Ware.

member.name: F:s2industries.ZUGFeRD.ContentCodes.ST1
member.summary: Es ergeben sich Entgeltminderungen auf Grund von Rabatt- und Bonusvereinbarungen.

member.name: F:s2industries.ZUGFeRD.ContentCodes.ST2
member.summary: Entgeltminderungen ergeben sich aus unseren aktuellen Rahmen- und Konditionsvereinbarungen.

member.name: F:s2industries.ZUGFeRD.CountryCodes.CD
member.summary: CONGO, THE DEMOCRATIC REPUBLIC OF THE

member.name: F:s2industries.ZUGFeRD.CountryCodes.MK
member.summary: MACEDONIA, THE FORMER YUGOSLAV REPUBLIC OF

member.name: F:s2industries.ZUGFeRD.CountryCodes.SH
member.summary: SAINT HELENA, ASCENSION AND TRISTAN DA CUNHA

member.name: F:s2industries.ZUGFeRD.CountryCodes.GS
member.summary: SOUTH GEORGIA AND THE SOUTH SANDWICH ISLANDS

member.name: T:s2industries.ZUGFeRD.CurrencyCodes
member.summary:
Full usage of http://csharpmoney.codeplex.com/ not required here, mapping of ISO codes sufficient.
ISO 4217 currency codes

member.name: T:s2industries.ZUGFeRD.GlobalID
member.summary:
Global ID definition according to ISO 6523: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_6523
For a full list of identifiers, see here: http://www.oid-info.com/doc/ICD-list.pdf
Especially important for ZUGFeRD: Code 0160 - GTIN - Global Trade Item Number for articles Code 0088 - EAN Location Code

member.name: F:s2industries.ZUGFeRD.GlobalID.SchemeID_EAN
member.summary: GS1 Global Trade Item Number (GTIN, EAN)

members.member: This party is optional and only relevant for Extended profile
This party is optional and only relevant for Extended profile
This party is optional and only relevant for Extended profile
This party is optional and only relevant for Extended profile

member.name: M:s2industries.ZUGFeRD.InvoiceDescriptor.Save(System.IO.Stream,s2industries.ZUGFeRD.ZUGFeRDVersion,s2industries.ZUGFeRD.Profile)
member.summary:
Saves the descriptor object into a stream.
The stream position will be reset to the original position after writing is finished. This allows easy further processing of the stream.

member.name: T:s2industries.ZUGFeRD.InvoiceValidator
member.summary:
Validator for ZUGFeRD invoice descriptor.
Currently limited to summarizing line totals
Output syntax copied from Konik library (https://konik.io/)

member.name: T:s2industries.ZUGFeRD.PaymentMeansTypeCodes
member.summary: Adopted to ZUGFeRD 1.0, German description from ZUGFeRD specification

member.name: F:s2industries.ZUGFeRD.PaymentMeansTypeCodes.NotDefined
member.summary: Keine Zahlungsart definiert Available in: Extended

member.name: F:s2industries.ZUGFeRD.PaymentMeansTypeCodes.AutomatedClearingHouseDebit
member.summary: Belastung durch automatisierte Clearingstelle, Z.B. bei Abwicklung durch Zahlungsdienstleister wie Online-Bezahlsysteme

member.name: F:s2industries.ZUGFeRD.PaymentMeansTypeCodes.DebitTransfer
member.summary:
Lastschriftübermittlung: Zahlung durch Belastung eines Geldbetrages eines Kontos zugunsten eines anderen. Überweisung international und nationale SEPA-Überweisung
Available in: Extended

member.name: F:s2industries.ZUGFeRD.PaymentMeansTypeCodes.PaymentToBankAccount
member.summary: Zahlung an Bankkonto Überweisung national, vor SEPA-Umstellung Available in: Basic, Extended

member.name: F:s2industries.ZUGFeRD.PaymentMeansTypeCodes.BankCard
member.summary: Bankkkarte, Kreditkarte Available in: Basic, Extended

member.name: F:s2industries.ZUGFeRD.PaymentMeansTypeCodes.ClearingBetweenPartners
member.summary: Ausgleich zwischen Partnern. Beträge, die zwei Partner sich gegenseitig schulden werden ausgeglichen um unnütze Zahlungen zu vermeiden. Available in: Basic, Extended

member.name: T:s2industries.ZUGFeRD.QuantityCodes
member.summary:
ISO Quantity Codes
for web reference, see e.g. http://www.robert-kuhlemann.de/iso_masseinheiten.htm

member.name: F:s2industries.ZUGFeRD.ReferenceTypeCodes.AAS
member.summary:
Transportdokumenten-Nummer
Referenz zu einem Transportdokument, vergeben vom Frachtführer oder seinem Agenten. (z.B. Paketdienst-Zustell-Nr.)

member.name: F:s2industries.ZUGFeRD.ReferenceTypeCodes.ALQ
member.summary:
Nummer einer Rücksendungsanzeige
Referenznummer für eine Rücksendungsanzeige. (z.B. Retourennummer)

member.name: F:s2industries.ZUGFeRD.ReferenceTypeCodes.AUT
member.summary: Net area supplier reference A reference identifying a supplier within a net area.

member.name: F:s2industries.ZUGFeRD.ReferenceTypeCodes.BC
member.summary:
Vertragsnummer (Käufer)
Referenznummer vergeben vom Käufer für einen Vertrag (z.B. Abkommennummer)

member.name: F:s2industries.ZUGFeRD.ReferenceTypeCodes.IV
member.summary: Invoice document identifier [1334] Reference number to identify an invoice.

member.name: F:s2industries.ZUGFeRD.SubjectCodes.AAJ
member.summary:
Zusätzliche Konditionen zu diesem Kauf
Angaben zum Eigentumsvorbehalt

member.name: F:s2industries.ZUGFeRD.SubjectCodes.PMT
member.summary:
Zahlungsinformation
Bekanntgabe der Abtretung der Forderung (Zession)

member.name: F:s2industries.ZUGFeRD.SubjectCodes.PRF
member.summary:
Preiskalkulationsschema
Zum Beispiel Angabe Zählerstand, Zähler etc. oder andere Hinweise bezüglich Abrechnung.

member.name: F:s2industries.ZUGFeRD.SubjectCodes.REG
member.summary:
Regulatorische Informationen
Angaben zum leistenden Unternehmen (Angabe Geschäftsführer, HR-Nummer etc.)

member.name: F:s2industries.ZUGFeRD.SubjectCodes.SUR
member.summary: Supplier remarks Remarks from or for a supplier of goods or services.

member.name: P:s2industries.ZUGFeRD.Tax.AllowanceChargeBasisAmount
member.summary: Gesamtbetrag Zu- und Abschläge des Steuersatzes, Wert

member.name: F:s2industries.ZUGFeRD.TaxCategoryCodes.A
member.summary:
Mixed tax rate
Code specifying that the rate is based on mixed tax.

member.name: F:s2industries.ZUGFeRD.TaxCategoryCodes.AA
member.summary:
Lower rate
Tax rate is lower than standard rate.

member.name: F:s2industries.ZUGFeRD.TaxCategoryCodes.AB
member.summary:
Exempt for resale
A tax category code indicating the item is tax exempt when the item is bought for future resale.

member.name: F:s2industries.ZUGFeRD.TaxCategoryCodes.AC
member.summary:
Value Added Tax (VAT) not now due for payment
A code to indicate that the Value Added Tax (VAT) amount which is due on the current invoice is to be paid on receipt of a separate VAT payment request.

member.name: F:s2industries.ZUGFeRD.TaxCategoryCodes.AD
member.summary:
Value Added Tax (VAT) due from a previous invoice
A code to indicate that the Value Added Tax (VAT) amount of a previous invoice is to be paid.

member.name: F:s2industries.ZUGFeRD.TaxCategoryCodes.B
member.summary:
Transferred (VAT)
VAT not to be paid to the issuer of the invoice but directly to relevant tax authority.

member.name: F:s2industries.ZUGFeRD.TaxCategoryCodes.C
member.summary: Duty paid by supplier Duty associated with shipment of goods is paid by the supplier; customer receives goods with duty paid.

member.name: F:s2industries.ZUGFeRD.TaxCategoryCodes.E
member.summary: Exempt from tax Code specifying that taxes are not applicable.

member.name: F:s2industries.ZUGFeRD.TaxCategoryCodes.G
member.summary: Free export item, tax not charged Code specifying that the item is free export and taxes are not charged.

member.name: F:s2industries.ZUGFeRD.TaxCategoryCodes.H
member.summary: Higher rate Code specifying a higher rate of duty or tax or fee.

member.name: F:s2industries.ZUGFeRD.TaxCategoryCodes.O
member.summary: Services outside scope of tax Code specifying that taxes are not applicable to the services.

member.name: F:s2industries.ZUGFeRD.TaxCategoryCodes.S
member.summary:
Standard rate
Code specifying the standard rate.

member.name: F:s2industries.ZUGFeRD.TaxCategoryCodes.Z
member.summary:
Zero rated goods
Code specifying that the goods are at a zero rate.

member.name: F:s2industries.ZUGFeRD.TaxRegistrationSchemeID.FC
member.summary:
Fiscal number
Tax payer's number. Number assigned to individual persons as well as to corporates by a public institution; this number is different from the VAT registration number.

member.name: F:s2industries.ZUGFeRD.TaxRegistrationSchemeID.VA
member.summary:
VAT registration number
Unique number assigned by the relevant tax authority to identify a party for use in relation to Value Added Tax (VAT).

member.name: F:s2industries.ZUGFeRD.TaxTypes.VAT
member.summary:
Value added tax
A tax on domestic or imported goods applied to the value added at each stage in the production/distribution cycle.

member.name: T:s2industries.ZUGFeRD.TradeAllowanceCharge
member.summary:
Zu- und Abschlag
Beispiel:
false 137.30 13.73 Sondernachlass
VAT S 7

member.name: P:s2industries.ZUGFeRD.TradeAllowanceCharge.ChargeIndicator
member.summary:
Schalter für Zu- und Abschlag
false: Abschlag true: Zuschlag
